title: "Adapdix addresses data scientist shortage with a $5/hour program"
excerpt: "Adapdix is utilizing its existing group of skilled employees and advanced AI/ML edge modeling software to meet the robust customer demand for AI/ML projects. This much-needed resource is then made available to Adapdix customers at a subsidized rate of $5 per hour."
